Package com.xing.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthErrorCallback
    A callback contract that allows to intercept auth errors in a centralized way.
    Callback<RT,ET>
    Communicates responses from a server or offline requests.
    CallSpec<RT,ET>
    An invocation of a resource method that sends a request to the XING API and returns a response.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CallSpec.Builder<RT,ET>
    Serves two purposes, to build the CallSpec and the underlying Request.
    ContentRange
    Represents the content range data of the response.
    HttpError
    Generic HTTP Error Object that maps the error response of the XING API.
    HttpError.Error
    Represents an error for a specific form field or query parameters, with a respective reason for the error.
    Resource
    Base class for all resources that provide access to various XING api endpoints.
    Resource.Factory
    Allows Resource creation via a non reflective api.
    Response<RT,ET>
    Response from executing a request with CallSpec.execute() or CallSpec.rawStream().
    XingApi
    Main access point for the XING API.
    XingApi.Builder
    Build a new XingApi.
    XingApi.BuildStep<T extends XingApi.BuildStep>
    TODO.
    XingApi.CustomStep
    TODO.
    XingApi.LoggedOutStep
    TODO.
    XingApi.OAuth1Step
    // TODO Calling XingApi.OAuth1Step.consumerKey(String), XingApi.OAuth1Step.consumerSecret(String), XingApi.OAuth1Step.accessSecret(String) and XingApi.OAuth1Step.accessToken(String) is required to allow access to logged in only content.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HttpError.Error.Reason
    Possible error reason values.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HttpException
    Exception for an unexpected, non-2xx HTTP response.
